spaced_repetition_learning_system: Un sistem de învățare cu repetiție distanțată
revolutionize_learning: Revoluționarizați experiența dumneavoastră de învățare cu Memnix, o aplicație care se adaptează la ritmul tuturor
a_personalized_system_content: Creați-vă propriile cărți flash in funcție de nevoile dumneavoastră specifice sau explorați-le pe cele din baza noastră de date publică
take_memnix_challenge_content: Seize the opportunity to learn by playing against yourself and to exceed your limits, intended for everyone and accessible for free
save_time_content: Don't worry about planning your studies, Memnix will take care of everything and optimize your revisions
accessible_from_anywhere_content: Wherever and whenever you need it, Memnix is accessible from any computer as long as you are connected to the Internet
our_team_content: We are a team of developers who are passionate about learning and teaching. We are always looking for new ideas and new ways to improve our products.
our_contributors_content: Our contributors are the ones who have contributed to the development of Memnix. We are very grateful to all of them for their help.
who_is_behind_memnix: Cine se află în spatele lui Memnix ?
who_is_behind_memnix_content: Memnix este un proiect open source creat de CorentinGS (aka Micul Prinț).
memnix_discord_content: Join the Memnix discord to meet developers and contributors, take part in the project and be part of a friendly community.
meet_our_team_content: Meet the team of contributors behind Memnix and chat about the project to suggest improvements or share your opinions.
unique_benetifs_content: Enjoy new features in beta, contests to try to win perks and unique events.
contribute_to_the_project_content: Contribute to the project by proposing translations and new features or by coding, designing and creating decks.
a_nice_community_content: Memnix is based on a real community of helpers whose goal is to ease learning for everyone.
no_notifications_to_read: You don't have any notifications to read...
name: Name
question: Question
we_use_cookies_content: Please, accept these sweeties to continue enjoying our site!
subscribe_to_deck_content: You will be able to play it whenever you want
daily_learning_recommended_content: Work on the deck using our spaced repetition learning algorithm.
free_learning_content: Practice the deck when you want.
